TitleEnglish: The Demon's Bride Wants to Be Eaten
SummaryEnglish: The story follows Mashiro who was saved by the demon Shuten-dōji when she was young. At 17-years-old, Mashiro was ripe for Shuten-dōji to eat her, so she decided to marry him. However, it appeared that Shuten-dōji became fond of her and did not plan to eat her. (source: ANN)
SummaryJapanese: 幼い頃に酒呑童子に救われたましろを追う。 17歳の時、酒呑童子が食べられるのに熟していたので、結婚することにした。 しかし、酒呑童子は彼女が好きになり、食べるつもりはなかったようです。
Aliases: 鬼 の 花嫁 和 食べられたい
